entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
